aircraft.value: Skyhawk Fighter - AC-1369-892 at Training Center Beta

defect_observed.value: Pressure regulator drift. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Foreign object damage to critical surface

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Bleed Air System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 09/12/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 11/12/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 11/12/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality assurance framework assessed. Investigation process followed established protocols. Findings are valid. Date: 12/12/2023 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) From regulatory standpoint, investigation meets required standards. Approve proposed corrective actions. Date: 16/12/2023 Signature: Eng. T.R. Menon

b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Bleed Air System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
